TopicTitle: Let Me Put Kerbals in Seats for Launch

Articles.Content: when i build rovers (and small aircraft with open cockpits) i like to test them on kerbin before i stick them on a ship for a mission. so far my workaround has been to have a pod on a decoupler, on launch get out, get in the seat and then eject the pod. this is very annoying! i would like the option to put kerbals in those seats from the crew tab.
Definitely a must! I've run into that exact problem - I usually just add a OKTO2 controller somewhere. It's useful if you want to send a rover to go resq... ahem... fetch some abandoned Kerblings...
Does seem like something that should be possible, have a YES, sir!
